title: shit download speed.
body: what the fuck is this download speed like 300kp/s meanwhile in steam I get 6mb/s. fix please.

yeah idk this is so stupid. whether i use steam, battle.net client, or pretty much EVERY other avenue for downloading and/or streaming i get around 14-16mb/s but LoL client (big surprise rito) is at 300kb/ps. but yes i am sure it is my settings and now i will spend 3 hours examining my setup to no avail. awesome

Sounds like your network has a decent download speed, but it can't quite get a clean connection to *our* servers for some reason. It might be due to some awkward [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), or you may just need to adjust some port forwards or flush your DNS. Run through those steps, and possibly try an ethernet connection if possible, and let me know how it goes.
